Title: Armour of God
Writer: Barry Wong (original story), Edward Tang (screenplay), Cheuk-Hon Szeto (screenplay), Ken Lowe (screenplay), John Sheppard (screenplay), Rod Dean (english adaptation)
Actors: Jackie Chan, Alan Tam, Rosamund Kwan, Lola Forner
Plot: Asian Hawk (Jackie Chan) and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks.
